price: “Waan hojjataa turtaniif jecha gaarii haala ta’een nyaadhaa; dhugaa” (isaaniin jedhama).
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
